TextQuestion.Name: open_realism
TextQuestion.Text: Can you comment on how realistic or unrealistic the virtual neighborhood seemed to you, and why you felt that way?

TextQuestion.Name: open_feel_real
TextQuestion.Text: Did you ever feel like you were really there in the neighborhood? Why, or why not?

TextQuestion.Name: open_disconcerting
TextQuestion.Text: Was there anything about the virtual neighborhood environment that seemed disconcerting, odd, or troublesome?
